title: Cargo Attributes in Rust Development
description: In this lab, it is explained that the crate_type and crate_name attributes in Rust have no effect when using Cargo, the Rust package manager, which is widely used for Rust projects.

meta.title: Rust Crate Attributes | Cargo Package Manager
meta.description: Explore the Rust crate attributes, including crate_type and crate_name, and learn how they are impacted by the widely-used Cargo package manager.
meta.keywords: Rust, Crate Attributes, Cargo, Package Manager, Crate Type, Crate Name

i18n.title: Atributos de Cargo en el Desarrollo de Rust

meta.title: Atributos de Caja (Crate) de Rust | Administrador de Paquetes Cargo
meta.description: Explora los atributos de caja (crate) de Rust, incluyendo crate_type y crate_name, y aprende cómo se ven afectados por el ampliamente utilizado administrador de paquetes Cargo.
meta.keywords: Rust, Atributos de Caja (Crate), Cargo, Administrador de Paquetes, Tipo de Caja (Crate), Nombre de Caja (Crate)
